synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Static vacuum (10–1 bar) at room temperature
comments: The duration of the reaction (4 days) is crucial for the isolation of the phase-pure compound.
The amount of THF in the final material decreases over time.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Allowed to stand in a nitrogen atmosphere for 10 minutes
comments: Cr(OSO2CH3)2(pyz)2, product 1 and Li[SO3CH3] are all insoluble in THF.
The color of product 1 (dark gray) contrasts notably with that of Cr(OSO2CH3)2(pyz)2 (light brown) suggesting the occurrence of a chemical modification during the course of the reaction.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Static vacuum (10–1 bar) at room temperature
comments: The duration of the reaction (4 days) is crucial for the isolation of the phase-pure compound.
The amount of THF in the final material decreases over time.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: 400 K for 18 hours or 500 K for 10 hours
synthesis_conditions.time: 18 hours at 400 K or 10 hours at 500 K
synthesis_conditions.equipment: Capped but only partially sealed screw cap-vial
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dynamic vacuum was unsuccessful as 2·0.25(THF) readily decomposed
comments: The 'drying' of 2·(THF) was performed by heating the solvate in a capped but only partially sealed screw cap-vial at 400 K for 18 hours or at 500 K for 10 hours under dinitrogen or argon atmosphere.
Further drying of the material under dynamic vacuum was unsuccessful as 2·0.25(THF) readily decomposed.
